lead_paragraph: The former Royals general manager Allard Baird was hired by the Boston Red Sox yesterday as an assistant to General Manager Theo Epstein. Baird held the job with the Royals from June 2000 until he was fired May 31.
snippet: The former Royals general manager Allard Baird was hired by the Boston Red Sox yesterday as an assistant to General Manager Theo Epstein. Baird held the job with the Royals from June 2000 until he was fired May 31.
